build.steps: Connect four pushbutton and four 10K ohm resistors on the breadboard

steps: 1. Connect a jumper wire from 5V to the positive rail of the breadboard
2. Connect breadboarding jumper wires from positive rail to one side of each of the resistors of the pusbuttons
1.Connect a jumper wire from D10 to one side of the resistor 4 (R4)
2.Connect a jumper wire from D9 to one side of the resistor 3 (R3)
3.Connect a jumper wire from D8 to one side of the resistor 2 (R2)
4.Connect a jumper wire from D7 to one side of the resistor 1 (R1)
5.Connect a jumper wire from GND to the negative rail of the breadboard
1. Connect a type C cable to your computer
2. Download the Scratch application and open the provided Scratch project
3. Press the first button (U) and observe what happens. Do the same to the other pushbuttons
